alert.note: Alert for Marion (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 3:26PM CDT until June 05 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Marion County in east Tennessee... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 326 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jasper, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Jasper, Kimball, Sequatchie Cave, Haletown (guild), Hicks Gap State Park and New Hope. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
